EmailTemplate.description: intro email when ist butter rep is assigned and compliant date over 9/1/2020
EmailTemplate.name: Project Butter - Intro Email
EmailTemplate.subject: New ACV Account Manager
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello There, I wanted to reach out and introduce myself as your new ACV account manager. I'll be your main point of contact here and will be giving you a call in the next couple of days to learn more about how I can support you and your dealership. Let me know if you have any questions in the meantime or if there is a preferred number at which I can reach you.
Thanks, {!Account.IST_Account_Owner__c}
